title: Dress code of a woman in front of other women in Islam
transcript: latifah from the u.s what are the dress code of a woman in front of her mahram's and other women they should not wear anything revealing so they can wear half sleeves they can wear something that shows their neck and the upper part of their uh chest they can wear maxi that shows below the uh the knees they must not wear anything that exposes their curves so tight jeans or tight skirts that exposes the curves is not permissible and they must not wear anything that is see-through and allah knows you
